title.rendered: Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA : Company name changed to Aqualis ASA

content.rendered:
Oslo, 20 August 2014

Reference is made to press release from Aqualis ASA (OSE: WEIFA) 19 Aug 2014 regarding the company changing name to Weifa ASA, and such name change being registered in the Norwegian Register of Business Enterprises.

On 24 July 2014 the general meeting of Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA resolved to change the Company’s name to Aqualis ASA, subsequent to Aqualis ASA changing its name to Weifa ASA. The new company name is now registered in the Norwegian Register of Business Enterprises.

Company name before name change: Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA
Company OSE ticker before name change: AQUA
Current Company name: Aqualis ASA
Current Company OSE ticker: AQUA  (unchanged)

*****

Contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
+47 901 101 53
christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Name change registered with the Norwegian Register of Business Enterprises
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: On 14 December 2020, the Extraordinary General Meeting of AqualisBraemar ASA resolved to change the company's name to AqualisBraemar LOC ASA. The name change has as of today been registered with the Norwegian Register of Business Enterprises (Norwegian: Foretaksregisteret). For further information, please contact: Investors and financial media Dean Zuzic,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: Share capital decrease registered
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the announcement on 20 May 2016 regarding a resolution passed at Aqualis' Annual General Meeting to reduce the share capital. The share capital decrease has been duly registered in the Norwegian Register of Business Enterprises. Following the share capital increase, Aqualis' registered share capital is NOK…

jetpack-related-posts.title: New share capital registered
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Reference is made to the previous announcements by AqualisBraemar ASA in respect of the rights issue of 8,882,575 new shares in the Company and the private placement of 4,375,000 new shares in the Company.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA : Presentation at Pareto Securities Oil & Offshore Conference 2014
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oslo, 10 September 2014 Aqualis ASA (OSE: AQUA) will today at 17:00 CET present the company at the Pareto Oil & Offshore Conference in Oslo. The presentation is attached to this stock exchange notice, and it will also be published on the company's website (www.aqualisbraemar.com). Pareto Conference 2014 Aqualis ASA…
